refnamediv.refpurpose: Send system real-time messages to the MIDI OUT port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Send system real-time messages to the MIDI OUT port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
Performance
refsect1.para: Sends a real-time message once, in init stage of current instrument. imsgtype parameter is a flag to indicate the message type.
